However there were no playmats or rules, and I can't find them online. Can anyone link me the rules to the MR card game and possible purchase link to some game mats?

Also 'Ultra rare' cards come approximatly 1 in every 3 packs, however in 72 packs I got none, is there something wrong?

Any help is appreciated, keep ranching!

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, July 13, 2010 - 01:47 pm:

The ultra rare cards are ridiculously few and far between. I have purchased many boxes of cards, and still had to trade online to get them all.

Artbox used to have the rules posted online. I can't find the link right now, but, I will look.
